title: RichWatchface-TW Android Wear
summary: A rich design watch face for Android Wear. Theme:Wood
developerAddress: 234 Dunview Ave,  North York, Ontario, Canada
description: A rich design watch face for Android Wear. [ Theme: wood ]- This app allow you to set a different timezone for sub watch.- Natural White, Light Brown, Green and Red color themes are provided for free. Other themes are available for purchasing either each color or a set.- 12 hours / 24 hours time format- Energy safe theme is available, thus when a watch turns to dim mode, it would replace a color theme to black theme to save a energy. ( you can set up either using energy-safe theme or using original theme through Settings. )
descriptionHTML:
A rich design watch face for Android Wear. [ Theme: wood ]

- This app allow you to set a different timezone for sub watch.
- Natural White, Light Brown, Green and Red color themes are provided for free. Other themes are available for purchasing either each color or a set.
- 12 hours / 24 hours time format
- Energy safe theme is available, thus when a watch turns to dim mode, it would replace a color theme to black theme to save a energy. ( you can set up either using energy-safe theme or using original theme through Settings. )
comments: Mildly Disappointing It crashes every time I try to go into settings. I can choose different watch faces, but I have a feeling there are additional settings (such as the secondary time zone) that I can't access. Otherwise, good looking faces.

Best watch face for me Elegant. Simple. Beautiful. Functional.  I'm happy to compromise on battery life to keep it always on! It's actually quite battery friendly even if kept always on.  Dim mode looks really cool too in the dark.
Can't see it Can't see it on my hauwai watch in the android wear app on my phone.
Doesn't work properly Crashes when trying to access settings
Constant crash. HTC ONE M9 Moto 360 V2.
Love the Brown wood! Synced up easily, great looking faces especially the brown.
